verses.verse: Ah <S%H1945><s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6767>rustling<s%> of <S%H3671>wings<s%>, which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>;

that <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, even in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, <S%H3212>saying<s%>, Go, ye <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4178>smooth<s%>, to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>onward<s%>, a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that meteth <S%H6978>out<s%> and treadeth <S%H4001>down<s%>, whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide<s%>!

All ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and ye <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, when an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> is lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7782>ye<s%>; and when the trumpet is <S%H8628>blown<s%>, hear <S%H8085>ye<s%>.

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8252>me<s%>, I will be still, and I will <S%H5027>behold<s%> in my <S%H4349>dwelling-place<s%>, like <S%H6703>clear<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> in <S%H216>sunshine<s%>, like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

For <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, when the <S%H6525>blossom<s%> is <S%H8552>over<s%>, and the <S%H5328>flower<s%> becometh a <S%H1580>ripening<s%> <S%H1155>grape<s%>, he will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with <S%H4211>pruning-hooks<s%>, and the spreading <S%H5189>branches<s%> will he take <S%H5493>away<s%> and cut <S%H8456>down<s%>.

They shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> unto the ravenous <S%H5861>birds<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and the ravenous <S%H5861>birds<s%> shall <S%H6972>summer<s%> upon <S%H929>them<s%>, and all the beasts of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall winter upon <S%H2778>them<s%>.

In that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall a <S%H7862>present<s%> be <S%H2986>brought<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4178>smooth<s%>, even from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>onward<s%>, a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that meteth <S%H6978>out<s%> and treadeth <S%H4001>down<s%>, whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide<s%>, to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
